title: EdEasy
description: A web app that helps in aggregating and organizing free open-source educational materials by grade, making education accessible worldwide with just an internet connection.

title: Svelte Project
description: An experimental portfolio website built with Svelte. Also space themed ;)

title: CIFAR-10 Image Classifier
description: Implemented a Convolutional Neural Network to classify images from the CIFAR-10 dataset , with an accuracy of 84%. The model was trained using TensorFlow and the Flask backend was used to serve the model as an API.

title: PriceMatch
description: A web app that allows users to take a picture of a product, recognizes it using Google Cloud Vision and catalogues it with a list of stores and prices, comparing the prices in each store.

title: Personal Website
description: This website you're on right now! I built it using Next.js, TailwindCSS and a Sanity backend. It was meant to be space themed, as a tribute to my love for space and astronomy.

title: MovieMatch
description: This is a secret. For now. Maybe forever (no).
